item.title: Puppet vim setup
item.description: The Goal Setup vim to edit Puppet Manifests using a few good tools that will get you to pass Puppet Lint tests. The Links PuppetLabs - link vim-puppet - link vim tabular - link vim syntastic - link Vim-Pathogen Vim-Pathogen on github [root@Argon ~]# mkdir -p ~/.vim/autoload ~/.vim/bundle [root@Argon ~]# cd ~/.vim/autoload [root@Argon ~]# curl -o pathogen.vim https://raw.github.com/tpope/vim-pathogen/master/autoload/pathogen.vim Add these settings to .
